 /: Search logs | Ctrl-F: Toggle full datetime | y: Copy log to clipboard | Ctrl-X: Clear all data | Ctrl-H: Move divider left | Ctrl-L: Move divider right | Ctrl-J: Move divider down | Ctrl-K: Mode divider up
